body: Hi Mauricio, Thanks for posting this. Can you post an example file that shows what you mean in the edit. Nevertheless you can always use Get Zone EnergyPlus Loads to check infiltration values assigned to any zone. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/g3YV6mxuqsv2PfdD5L34loWciagZ7alRbHeERggsn41Mabnw2y5R5o-WUmEpbFxnRzdkLintGrtQwdw7RrQUGg5*tHr23dSj/checkZoneLoads.png)
